About the Company: Super Spinning Mills Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of grey, gassed, mercerised and dyed cotton yarn. The product range of the company includes NE 20s to NE 120s,Regular Grey Yarn,Single / Double (Ring Double / TFO),Compact Single & Double, Elitwist,Gassed Yarns,Open-End Yarn,Core-Spun Yarn,Slub-Yarn,Zero Twist Yarn,Knitted Garments (Specialised in single/double Mercerised Cotton knit in polo T-shirts)and Woven Fabrics.To meet out the customer requirements the company has various options in raw materials :Indian Cotton,GIZA ,GIZA Blends,Supima ,PIMA Blends and Organic Cottons.
